heading.headline: MathSender
heading.byline: Visual identity and website development for an online learning system.

post.content:
MathSender is a tool designed to help teachers ask maths questions to students during online learning. Born out of how garbage sending equations via Webex text chat is, MathSender provides a way to send beautiful LaTeX based expressions in real time via a question and answer system.


**MathSender's source code is open-access.**
post.title: MathSender

images.alt: The colours of electric blue and yellow were chosen as the accent colours for MathSender.

post.leadIn: Visual identity and website development for an online learning system.
post.skills: Website design, Website development, Python development.

quote.quotee: Mr F, a teacher at John Monash Science School
